carpooling_package

Class Subscribers

  • java.lang.Object
    • carpooling_package.Passenger
      • carpooling_package.Subscribers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Displayable

    public class Subscribers
extends Passenger
    A class representing Subscribers passengers Data only to apply Single Responsibility Principle.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Subscribers

        public Subscribers(java.lang.String name,
                   int age,
                   int numberOfTripsToBeReserved)
        Class constructor that calls the super Constructor setting its name from arguments and sets age and number of trips to be reserved with the arguments. It is called when a new subscriber is initialized.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the passenger.
        age - The passenger's age.
        numberOfTripsToBeReserved - The number of trips to be reserved by the passenger.
        See Also:
        Passenger.Passenger(java.lang.String)

      • Subscribers

        public Subscribers(java.lang.String name,
                   int age,
                   int numberOfTripsToBeReserved,
                   Car c,
                   ticket t)
        Class constructor that calls the super Constructor setting its name, car, ticket from arguments and sets age and number of trips to be reserved with the arguments. It is called when a nonSubscriber decides to subscribe and be a subscriber.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the passenger.
        age - The passenger's age.
        numberOfTripsToBeReserved - The number of trips to be reserved by the passenger.
        c - Car rode by passenger
        t - ticket reserved for passenger
        See Also:
        Passenger.Passenger(java.lang.String, carpooling_package.Car, carpooling_package.ticket)
